channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump to meet with House Republicans amid questions about Venezuela
item.description: President Trump is set to meet with House Republicans Tuesday at the Kennedy Center as lawmakers in both chambers are calling for more details on the ...

item.title: Trump says the U.S. plans to "take back" Venezuela's oil. But what could that mean
item.description: President Trump says the U.S. will "take back" Venezuela's oil. NPR's Leila Fadel talks to Jason Bordoff, founding director of Columbia University's C...

item.title: George Conway, a Trump Foe, Changes Home and Party to Run for Congress
item.description: The former conservative has moved from the Washington suburbs to Manhattan and will run for an open House seat in a heavily Democratic district.

item.title: Swiss Bar Hit by Deadly Fire Was Not Inspected for Five Years, Authorities Say
item.description: Officials in Crans-Montana, the Swiss alpine resort town where a bar fire killed 40 people last week, are facing growing accusations of lax oversight.

item.title: Pentagon will begin review of 'effectiveness' of women in ground combat positions
item.description: The review, outlined in a Pentagon memo obtained by NPR, comes after Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth told admirals and generals in September that women...

item.title: Tim Walz’s 17 Months in Politics Before Ending His Re-election Bid
item.description: Mr. Walz drew national notice when Kamala Harris chose him as her running mate. A fraud scandal derailed his bid for re-election as Minnesota’s govern...

item.title: Peace Is Unraveling
item.description: As states disregard limits on the lawful use of force, this may be just the beginning of a slide into frequent war.

item.title: The criminal prosecution of Nicolás Maduro is underway. Here's what to expect
item.description: Now begins what could be a lengthy legal process of pretrial motions, potential plea negotiations and possibly a jury trial of the authoritarian leade...

item.title: More seniors are becoming homeless. Shelters are trying to adapt
item.description: Older adults are the fastest-growing homeless population across the U.S. Now some shelters are trying to make it easier to accommodate older people.

item.title: Facing Challenge From Lander, Dan Goldman Prepares to Defend His Seat
item.description: Mr. Goldman, a Democrat from New York City, faces a stiff primary battle that could turn on Gaza and how to fight President Trump.

item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.
